document.title: Treatment Plan for Kate's Upper Teeth
document.summary: This treatment involves using traditional braces to adjust the alignment of your upper teeth. The expected duration is between 7 to 10 months, and progress will be monitored through a mix of remote and in-person check-ins. Some attachments may be used to assist with tooth movement. Whitening is not included in this treatment package.
next_steps: Discuss any concerns or questions with your dental team
